class.name: LinearSolverLu

javadoc.text: For each column in the B matrix it makes a copy, which is then solved for and * writen into X. By making a copy of the column cpu cache issues are reduced.
javadoc.author: Peter Abeles

method.name: solve
method.comment: for( int j = 0; j < numCols; j++ ) {
for( int i = 0; i < this.numCols; i++ ) vv[i] = dataB[i*numCols+j];
for( int i = 0; i < this.numCols; i++ ) dataX[i*numCols+j] = vv[i];
